      • invoke

        public void invoke(Geometry g,
                   EditableFeature featureInput)
        clips feature's geometry with the clipping geometry, preserving feature's original attributes. If feature's geometry doesn't touch clipping geometry, it will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        invoke in class GeometryOperation
